arguments.description: A mapping of arguments to include with the command.

command.description: Path to the command te be executed.

name.description: Name by which to reference the checkcommand

templates.description: A list of Icinga2 templates to assign to the host.

check_command.description: The name of an existing Icinga2 CheckCommand object that is used to determine if the host is available or not.

templates.description: A list of Icinga2 templates to assign to the host.

vars.description: A mapping of variables to assign to the host.

display_name.description: The name of the hostgroup to display in the Icinga2 interface.

check_command.description: The name of an existing Icinga2 CheckCommand object that is used to determine if the service is available on the host.

hostname.description: The host to check the service's status on

name.description: The name of the Service object.
